::Halucigen::
Halucigen ducked the grab and with a stroke of his wings flew back 
out of reach. His nightmare effect may not have worked but he still 
learned some useful information from the bots mind.  He liked the 
style of this group. Fight first...talk if possible later.
The tail of Halucigen fired a rocket at a wall near him and when the 
rocket hit it corroded with highly acidic liquid.  He ran through. 
The much larger bot would have trouble following Halucigen.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., James T <t882hcc91@y...> wrote:
> Spy Streak:
> 
>      He looked into the bots eyes, but nothing
> happened. When Magmatron had built him he had not
> programmed nightmares or dreams. He also knew who his
> leader was, Magmatron, nothing could break that bond.
>      "Uh huh," Spy Streak said. He grabbed at the
> small bots neck.
>
